name: Peter & Interviewing
description:
Peter is being interviewed by Dr. Heart. There's more to it than that, but I'll let you figure it out. If it's confusing or weird, don't worry, it's meant to be like that. 

Depending on the few choices you make, you'll gain access to hidden images. If you feel adventurous, try to see if you can find all five of them!

Trigger Warning: Mentions/Implied Abduction, Kidnapping, and implied violence against people, mainly children. 

If you feel the trigger warnings should be updated, please let me know.
